import React from 'react'; const AdminControlsPage = () => { return (
{/* Sidebar */}
ELECTIONS
2025
Voting opens in:
6hr 17m 25s
  • 🔗 Connect Wallet
  • 🗳️ Vote
  • 📊 Results
  • ⚙️ Admin Controls
POWERED BY:
CADENA CAST
{/* Main Content */}

ADMIN CONTROLS

STATUS OF ELECTION: NOT STARTED
{/* Start Election */}
▶️

START ELECTION

Initiate the voting process and open polls to all registered voters.

{/* Pause Voting */}
⏸️

PAUSE VOTING

Temporarily suspend voting activity for system maintenance.

{/* End Election */}
⏹️

END ELECTION

Close voting permanently and prepare for results calculation.

); }; export default AdminControlsPage;
